name: [vam] party in the dark
description:
It's your best friend Willow's birthday, who just so happens to be a vampire! You go over to their house in hopes of celebrating but you find them upset on their special day. Thus begins your quest in making the world dark, so they can go out and have the best birthday ever!


Team:

Lucy Gold - Programming, Project Management, Designer, Asset Creator

Bram Johnson - Sound designer, Programmer

Brooke Glasier - Concept Art, Character Art and Animation

Zach Zhou - Concept Art, Background Art

sheepdog - Music, Programming

Ezgi Bas - Art and Animation
